title: Accommodation
---

The conference venue, **National Film and Sound Archive of Australia** (NFSA), is within walking distance to CBD, so any CBD hotel is generally suitable.

## Discounts for Delegates 


- [Novotel Canberra](https://all.accor.com/ssr/app/accor/rates/2796/index.en.shtml?dateIn=2025-11-24&nights=4&compositions=1&stayplus=false&snu=false&accessibleRooms=false&hideWDR=false&productCode=null&hideHotelDetails=false) (15% off Best Available Rate, discount is subject to availability)
- [Peppers Gallery Hotel Canberra](https://all.accor.com/a/en.html) (No pre-payment required, cancel up to 1 day prior to arrival date) Enter the promo code `EVENTSPECIAL25`<br> ![](/images/hotel-discount.png){style="border: 1px solid black;"}
- [Midnight Hotel](https://www.marriott.com/en-us/hotels/cbrak-midnight-hotel-autograph-collection/overview/?scid=cf432f1f-54d2-411a-89ce-225188630324) enter the code `KF7` at the Corp/Promo Code area under Special Rates<br> ![](/images/Discount Code - Screenshot Help .png){style="border: 1px solid black;"}
